eligibility: Eligibility differs by program. For MA courses, candidates must have completed a bachelor's degree in the respective field with at least 55% marks. Reserved categories receive relaxation in minimum percentage. There is no age bar for PG courses. Final year/semester students may also apply, but must submit proof of eligibility at the time of admission.[2][4]

faqs.question: Can a final year/semester student apply for JNUEE (PG)?
faqs.answer: Yes, final year/semester students can apply. Admission is provisional and subject to submission of proof of eligibility and minimum prescribed marks at the time of admission.[4]
